info.name: Jueteng Platform API
info.description:
Complete API collection for the Jueteng Digital Platform.

Base URL: {{baseUrl}}
Auth: JWT Bearer via httpOnly cookies (auto-set on login/register).
Currency: PHP

---

**Setup:**
1. Set `baseUrl` variable to `http://localhost:3000/api`
2. Register or Login — cookies are auto-attached
3. Use `{{id}}` variable for single-record operations

item.name: Health
item.description: System health and readiness checks. No authentication required.

request.description: Returns basic status, timestamp, and uptime.
Enhanced health check with SLA monitoring status.
Redis connectivity check — returns latency, memory usage, total keys.

item.name: Auth
item.description:
Registration, login, token management, OTP verification, and user profile.
Rate-limited: 10 requests per 15 minutes.

request.description: Register a new PLAYER or AGENT account. Creates Person, User, Wallet, and Session. Returns JWT access token in httpOnly cookie.
Authenticate with email + password. Returns access & refresh tokens as httpOnly cookies. Updates lastLogin timestamp.
Invalidate the current session. Clears token and refreshToken cookies. Deletes session record from DB.
Exchange a valid refresh token (from cookie or body) for a new access token. Rotates the refresh token and session.
Change the authenticated user's password. Requires current password verification. Auth required.
Get the current authenticated user's full profile including person details, wallet, KYC status, and agent info. Auth required.
Request a one-time password sent via EMAIL or SMS. Types: REGISTRATION, LOGIN, PASSWORD_RESET, PHONE_VERIFICATION, EMAIL_VERIFICATION, WITHDRAWAL.
Verify a previously requested OTP code. Marks OTP as verified and updates user verification flags.

item.name: Agent
item.description:
Manage agents in the Jueteng network — Cobrador, Cabo, Operator, Capitalista, Pagador, Bolador.
All endpoints require authentication.

request.description: List all agents with pagination, filtering, sorting, and grouping.
Get a single agent by MongoDB ObjectId.
Create a new agent. Roles: COBRADOR, CABO, OPERATOR, CAPITALISTA, PAGADOR, BOLADOR.
Partially update an agent (role, territory, commission rate, status).
Permanently delete an agent record.

item.name: Territory
item.description:
Geographic areas (barangays, municipalities) managed by Cabos and their Cobradors.
All endpoints require authentication.

request.description: List all territories with pagination, filtering, sorting.
Get a single territory by MongoDB ObjectId.
Create a new territory.
Partially update territory details.
Permanently delete a territory.

item.name: Wallet
item.description:
User wallets holding PHP balances. One wallet per user, created automatically on registration.
All endpoints require authentication.

request.description: List all wallets with pagination, filtering, sorting.
Get a single wallet by ID.
Create a new wallet (admin use — wallets are auto-created on registration). Status: ACTIVE, FROZEN, CLOSED.
Update wallet (adjust balance, change status).
Permanently delete a wallet.

item.name: KYC
item.description:
Know Your Customer identity verification. Users upload ID documents for admin review.
All endpoints require authentication.

request.description: List all KYC records with pagination, filtering, sorting.
Get a single KYC record by ID.
Submit a new KYC verification request. Status: PENDING, APPROVED, REJECTED, REQUIRES_MORE_INFO.
Update KYC status (admin approval/rejection).
Permanently delete a KYC record.

item.name: Session
item.description:
JWT refresh token sessions. Created automatically on login/register. Used for token rotation and device tracking.
All endpoints require authentication.

request.description: List all sessions with pagination, filtering, sorting.
Get a single session by ID.
Create a new session (admin/internal use — sessions are auto-created on login).
Update session details.
Delete a session (force-logout a device).

item.name: Notification
item.description:
Real-time notifications via Socket.io (IN_APP) and external channels (SMS, EMAIL, PUSH).
Returns only notifications owned by the authenticated user.
All endpoints require authentication.

request.description: Get all notifications for the current authenticated user.
Get the count of unread (non-READ) notifications for the current user.
Get a single notification by ID (ownership check enforced).
Create and send a notification. Types: SYSTEM, TRANSACTION, KYC_UPDATE, DRAW_RESULT, PAYOUT, SECURITY, COMMISSION. Channels: IN_APP, SMS, EMAIL, PUSH.
Full update of a notification. Status: PENDING, SENT, READ, FAILED.
Mark a single notification as read (sets readAt and status to READ).
Mark all notifications for the current user as read.
Delete a notification.

item.name: Jueteng Config
item.description:
Global game configuration — one active config at a time.
Controls number ranges, payout multiplier, bet limits, and commission rates.
All endpoints require authentication.

request.description: List all config records (typically only one is active).
Get a config record by ID.
Create a new game config (usually to supersede the old one).
Update config values (payout multiplier, bet limits, commission rates).
Delete a config record.

item.name: Draw Schedule
item.description:
Recurring daily draw schedule templates (MORNING at 11:00 AM, AFTERNOON at 4:00 PM Manila time).
Each schedule spawns daily JuetengDraw instances.
All endpoints require authentication.

request.description: List all draw schedules.
Get a single draw schedule by ID.
Create a new draw schedule. drawType: MORNING or AFTERNOON.
Update schedule (change time, cutoff, active status).
Delete a draw schedule.

item.name: Jueteng Draw
item.description:
A single draw instance created per schedule per day.
Lifecycle: SCHEDULED → OPEN → CLOSED → DRAWN → SETTLED.
All endpoints require authentication.

request.description: List all draws with pagination, filtering (by date, status, type).
Get a single draw by ID (includes bets, payouts, commissions).
Create a new draw instance. Status: SCHEDULED, OPEN, CLOSED, DRAWN, SETTLED, CANCELLED.
Update draw — enter winning numbers, change status, record settlement.
Delete a draw record.

item.name: Jueteng Bet
item.description:
Individual bets placed by players through cobradors on a specific draw.
Player picks two numbers from 1 to maxNumber (default 37).
All endpoints require authentication.

request.description: List all bets with pagination, filtering (by draw, bettor, status).
Get a single bet by ID.
Place a new bet on an open draw. Status: PENDING, WON, LOST, VOID, REFUNDED.
Settle a bet — mark as WON/LOST/VOID, set payout amount.
Delete a bet record.

item.name: Jueteng Payout
item.description:
Payout records for winning bets. Created during draw settlement.
Lifecycle: PENDING → PAID → CLAIMED.
All endpoints require authentication.

request.description: List all payouts with pagination, filtering (by draw, bettor, status).
Get a single payout by ID.
Create a payout for a winning bet. Status: PENDING, PAID, CLAIMED, FAILED, CANCELLED.
Update payout — mark as PAID/CLAIMED, assign pagador.
Delete a payout record.

item.name: Commission
item.description:
Commission records generated during draw settlement for agents.
Types: COLLECTION (cobrador), WINNER_BONUS (cabo), CAPITALISTA, FIXED.
All endpoints require authentication.

request.description: List all commissions with pagination, filtering (by agent, draw, type).
Get a single commission record by ID.
Create a commission record. Types: COLLECTION (15%), WINNER_BONUS (5%), CAPITALISTA (25%), FIXED. Status: PENDING, PAID, CANCELLED.
Update commission — mark as PAID.
Delete a commission record.

item.name: Template
item.description:
Generic CRUD template model used for testing and scaffolding.
All endpoints require authentication.

request.description: List all templates with pagination, filtering, sorting.
Get a template by ID.
Create a new template.
Update a template.
Delete a template.

item.name: Docs
item.description: Auto-generated API documentation endpoints. No authentication required.

query.description: Filter by HTTP method (GET, POST, etc.)

request.description: Get all registered API endpoints as JSON or plain text. Filterable by tag and method.
Get the OpenAPI 3.0 specification (JSON).
Get a Postman collection export (JSON).
Generate IML (Integration Markup Language) files. Filterable by tag. Supports JSON and XML.
